title: Correct graph of object with zero net force

content.description: Three objects can only move along a straight, level path. The graphs below show the position d of each of the objects plotted as a function of time t.
content.question: The sum of the forces on the object is zero in which of the cases?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
